title: PANDA: SDX Produktkonfiguration // Domain Extension (LAN + WIFI) (Design)
description:
Description
PANDA: SDX Produktkonfiguration // Domain Extension (LAN + WIFI) (Design)
Click-dummy
Check current click-dummy Design with new decisions / product development
Invision Link Click-dummy und Design Specs: https://telekom.invisionapp.com/share/HDQDILNRUXZ#/screens/345345780
Implementation preparation
Custom Tables
1) Develop pricing custom tables
2) Develop P+ product custom tables
Rules and Trigger
3) Define rules and triggers for product configuration
Product views
4) Define product summary views (Summary tab and summary on product view)
5) Define Shopping Cart view
acceptance_criteria:
DOD1 Design click-dummy has been finalized and has been approved by Offering
DOD2 Necessary Custom tables for pricing and P+ tables etc. are defined
DOD3 Necessary rules and triggers for product configuration are defined
DOD4 Necessary product views are defined
DOD5 Necessary sales report / Leistungsschein are defined
